author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Mamo and Dale
body:
I was at Tales of the Wolf, and I was wondering if the update about the 
Lupin Mamo dub referred to the Cantonese dub, cus Dale told me about it, and 
called it the "Perfect Lupin dub" or something like that. I also lost his 
email at AX, and was wondering if the guy had it, cus I wouldn't mind 
cosplaying as Jigen at AX since his outfits rock! BTW, the Jigen at this AX 
had to have one of those giant mallets they use in Ranma, because plastic 
guns weren't allowed for cosplaying. Dale's also the guy who told me about 
Manga buying Mamo, so I'm sure he's right. He truly is the ultimate Lupin 
otaku with the belt buckle from Cagliostro, a model Walther and the new 
manga that's not drawn by Monkey Punch but written by him.
